Battles in the Shadow () is a 1938 Italian spy thriller film directed by Domenico Gambino and starring Antonio Centa, Dria Paola and Paola Barbara. It was shot at the Cinecitt√† Studios in Rome. The film's sets were designed by the art director Giorgio Pinzauti.
Synopsis
A group of foreign agents steal a formula for a new explosive, then kidnap the scientist's secretary to try and force her to decode the blueprints.
